Subjects: Faith, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Osbern Bokenam, ‘Life of St. Faith’ — rhyme royal

BLAru327.First Lines:
Whylom whan fers dyoclycianExercisyd hys cruel
                    tyrannye…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…Of lyuyng so to be clensyd fro synneWych on þi day to
                    hyuyn fyrst dyde begyn.
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern
                    Bokenam…Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
Her begynnth þe lyf of seynt feyth (rubric, f. 66) And seynt feyth
                    (index, f. 193)
